articles.title: Kartik Aaryan threatened to quit Shehzada if Ala Vaikunthapurramuloo Hindi released, reveals producer - India Today
articles.description: In an exclusive chat with IndiaToday.in, producer Manish Shah revealed that Kartik Aaryan threatened to walk out of Shehzada if Ala Vaikunthapurramuloo’s Hindi version was released in theatres. The dubbing apparently cost the producer Rs 2 crore.
